results.title: Comparative Evaluation of Tetracycline Hydrochloride Fiber and Simvastatin Gel as an Adjunct to Scaling and Root Planing in Periodontitis Patients
results.text_hl: In the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group from baseline to after six months, a highly significant reduction was seen in the modified sulcular @<m>DISEASE_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@bleeding@@@ index.

results.title: Effect of locally applied simvastatin on clinical attachment level and alveolar bone in periodontal maintenance patients: A randomized clinical trial
results.text_hl: Another study by Pradeep et al. reported a statistically significant decrease in @<m>DISEASE_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@bleeding@@@ index at 6 months when comparing placebo group (1.61 +- 0.43) to the test group (0.80 +- 0.18) that received local application of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ combined with SRP (p = 0.001).

citations.NLM: Killeen AC, Krell LE, Bertels M, Christiansen MM, Anderson L, Hattervig RL, Samson KK, Wang D, Reinhardt RA. Effect of locally applied simvastatin on clinical attachment level and alveolar bone in periodontal maintenance patients: A randomized clinical trial J Periodontol. 2022 Nov;93(11):1682-1690. PMID: 35622060

results.title: Simvastatin is Efficacious in Treating Cirrhosis: A Meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: The use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in @DISEASE_Idiopathic_Noncirrhotic_Portal_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000094724 @@@cirrhotic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ lowers mortality rates by suppressing incidences of fatal @<m>DISEASE_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@bleeding@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhang H, Zhang Q, Li S, Xie B. Simvastatin is Efficacious in Treating Cirrhosis: A Meta-analysis. J Clin Gastroenterol. 2022 Sep 1;56(8):e303-e312. PMID: 35830548

results.title: Effects of Simvastatin on Pharmacokinetics and Anticoagulant Effects of Dabigatran in Healthy Subjects
results.text_hl: Similarly, a case-control study has reported an association between major @<m>DISEASE_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@hemorrhage@@@ after use of @CHEMICAL_Dabigatran @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069604 @@@dabigatran@@@ and co-administration with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

results.title: Modified Sijunzi Granules Exhibit Hemostatic Effect by Activating Akt and Erk Signal Pathways via Regulating 5-HT and Its Receptors Levels.
results.text_hl: METHODS: AB strain wild type @SPECIES_7955 @@@zebrafish@@@ were treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (6 micromol/L) for 24 h to establish the @<m>DISEASE_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@hemorrhage@@@ model (model control group).

results.title: Association between statin use and ischemic stroke or major hemorrhage in patients taking dabigatran for atrial fibrillation.
authors: Canadian Drug Safety and Effectiveness Research Network
results.text_hl: In contrast, use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@ were associated with a higher risk of major @<m>DISEASE_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@hemorrhage@@@ (adjusted OR 1.46, 95% CI 1.17 to 1.82).

citations.NLM: Antoniou T, Macdonald EM, Yao Z, Hollands S, Gomes T, Tadrous M, Mamdani MM, Juurlink DN, Canadian Drug Safety and Effectiveness Research Network. Association between statin use and ischemic stroke or major hemorrhage in patients taking dabigatran for atrial fibrillation. CMAJ. 2017 Jan 9;189(1):E4-E10. PMID: 28246253
